attributes.action: Legalise e-scooters so people can travel to work and reduce congestion
attributes.additional_details: Because all we are seeing now is damage by global warming all caused by emissions from motor vehicles etc. This would help people get to work and not be stuck in traffic. Especially those who don't have a driving licence and can't ride a bike. E-scooters would be perfect to the more responsible adult.
attributes.background: Make e-scooters legal to anyone over the age of 18 to commute to work. Its better for traffic and the environment, Its easier for people to travel that can't ride a bike and don't have a driving licence. I do think people over the age of 18 will be more responsible.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Legalize the use of e-scooters where bikes can be used.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583107
